de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.tripmodel.core

Interface PathSearchingAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dijkstra, PedestrianStochPathSelection, RandomizedDijkstra, SpeedPathSelection, VehicularStochPathSelection

    public interface PathSearchingAlgorithm
    This interface is for searching a path between two points
    Author:
    Illya Stepanov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FLAG_IGNORE_DIRECTIONS
      Signals the path-searching algorithm to ignore attributes of the movement area, e.g., one-way roads, etc.
      static int FLAG_REFLECT_DIRECTIONS
      Signals the path-searching algorithm to reflect attributes of the movement area, e.g., one-way roads, etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Trip getPath(SpatialModel spatialModel, Node node, Point ps, Point pd, int flags)
      Calculates a path for the node between two vertices.

    • Field Detail

      • FLAG_IGNORE_DIRECTIONS

        static final int FLAG_IGNORE_DIRECTIONS
        Signals the path-searching algorithm to ignore attributes of the movement area, e.g., one-way roads, etc.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FLAG_REFLECT_DIRECTIONS

        static final int FLAG_REFLECT_DIRECTIONS
        Signals the path-searching algorithm to reflect attributes of the movement area, e.g., one-way roads, etc.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        Trip getPath(SpatialModel spatialModel,
             Node node,
             Point ps,
             Point pd,
             int flags)
        Calculates a path for the node between two vertices.

        Parameters:
        spatialModel - Spatial Model
        node - node
        ps - source point
        pd - destination point
        flags - path-searching flags
        Returns:
        path points
